At Definitive Healthcare, our passion is to transform data, analytics and expertise into healthcare commercial intelligence. We help clients uncover the right markets, opportunities and people, so they can shape tomorrow’s healthcare industry. Our SaaS platform creates new paths to commercial success in the healthcare market, so companies can identify where to go next.Our employees are kind, collaborative, energetic, approachable and driven. On top of that, we value the unique perspectives, backgrounds and voices of our employees. Why? Because their diverse experiences drive new ideas and help us build a better community.For over 10 years, we’ve built a collaborative culture driven by employees who share a passion for improving the healthcare ecosystem, enjoy giving back to the local community and value diversity and inclusion.One of the hallmarks of our culture is our commitment to community service. Through the DefinitiveCares program, employees can work with their choice of more than 40 charitable organizations, supporting causes from hunger and homelessness to healthcare, LGBTQ+ issues, racial justice, women’s initiatives and more. 2021 marked the sixth year that we had 100% employee participation in DefinitiveCares.We also provide a range of opportunities for employees to connect with each other. Employees can join any of our employee run affinity groups supporting causes such as women’s empowerment, LGBTQ+, Black, indigenous and people of color (BIPOC), disabilities and working parents and potential for many more. Affinity groups often enable greater education companywide through training, events and speaker series.We’re also a great place to work. For five years in a row, we’ve been recognized by the Boston Business Journal and the Boston Globe as a best place to work in Massachusetts. In 2022, Energage recognized us for Culture Excellence in Compensation & Benefits, Innovation, Great Leadership, Purpose & Value and Work-Life Flexibility!Think you’d be a good addition to our team? Explore our available positions here. We’d love the chance to get to know you.Analytical Wizards is now a part of Definitive Healthcare. With the acquisition of Analytical Wizards, we launched the Definitive Healthcare Passport Analytics Suite to bring data-agnostic intelligence on-demand to life sciences customers.The Passport Analytics Suite, powered by Analytical Wizards, delivers commercial intelligence around product planning, product performance and marketing optimization. The suite combines a highly configurable front-end application environment with an automated, efficient and scalable back-end cloud platform. Clients can quickly and seamlessly combine data from virtually any internal or third-party source and then use patent-pending analytics to immediately obtain the intelligence needed to reach peak revenue and profit.Role Description:This role of Director, Business Analysis & Insights is a key one that owns the client relationship within an organization in partnership with the Strategy Principal/s and Business Development Team. Leads client engagement and project management from a relationship building and delivery standpoint. Responsible for building and nurturing senior level relationships across multiple functions within the client organization/s. Responsible for proactively identifying opportunities for upsell and cross sell in partnership with the Strategy Principal/s and Business Development Team for a given client account and for scoping projects by translating client business questions into an analytical framework.Leads execution of all ongoing work at given client /organization and serves as the single point of contact for client teams on ongoing projects. Partners closely with internal and external stakeholders, manages and executes projects successfully, communicating milestones and results. Responsible for day-to-day project needs of the client with the ability to manage on shore & offshore teams and provide quick analytical & data science solutions & analyze data.Incumbent may be required to work as an individual contributor and/or manage a project team with on site and offshore support, with ability to manage & prioritize across multiple deadlines & projects and must possess excellent client management and project management skills.Candidate must be familiar with offline and online marketing and promotion strategies, marketing operations, data sources, and a deep understanding of methodologies used to assess the impact of promotion, including marketing mix and test/control analysis.To summarize, the Director, Business Analysis & Insights lead works actively in partnership with Strategy Principal/s and Business Development Team to identify and generate cross sell and upsell opportunities within client organization/s. Builds and maintains relationships across cross functional teams and partners with client teams to deliver client satisfaction.Key Responsibilities:Translate client business need and problem into appropriate analytical solution across all commercial analytics in Pharma-Biotech organizations- Brand Insights & Analytics, Marketing, Sales. Manage & Execute data & analytical projects.Marketing Optimization Projects in the areas of Marketing Mix Modeling, Promotional Responsiveness (ROI), Segmentation/Targeting, Multi-Channel/Digital Marketing Effectiveness and Sales Forecasting.Predictive analytics and applications like Patient Finder, Dynamic Targeting and Brand Performance/Opportunity optimizationServe as a thought partner and strategic advisor to the client team and organization.Build insightful summaries and decks (storyboarding), provide actionable insights and strategic recommendations to clients and other stakeholders.Lead on & offshore internal teams, maintain seamless communication with client & internal organization, manage expectations, seek clarifications, resolve conflicting priorities proactively.Qualifications:Deep understanding of Pharma-Biotech industry trends and organizational structure & business functionsAbility to translate business problems into powerful analytical solutions and concrete project plans.Proven Ability to think out of the box, assess current processes and offer ideas for improvement.Data Science background and familiarity with datasets and data sources in the Pharma/Biotech space including Claims, EMR/EHS, Remit Data, Lab/Diagnostics data, Customer master data, Physician Affiliation data, Specialty Pharmacy & Distribution data is preferred.Familiarity with promotional and marketing data sources, metrics, and data operationsAbility to utilize data and models to inform media strategy and identify performance opportunities, partnering with brand and agency stakeholders. Expertise in one or more of programming tools such as R, Python, SAS, and SQL is preferred.Ability to identify cross sell and up sell opportunities at the client organization by being aware of and engaging in their core day to day business issues.Proven experience and Ability to manage combination of on site and offshore Project teams internally and externally at the client end.Ability to build relationships across hierarchy and at senior levels within client organizations.Ability to set and manage expectations and deliver on them to maintain high client satisfaction.Requirements:Minimum 7+ years' experience in Market Research and Business Analytics, Advanced analytics or strategy consulting within Pharma-Biotech organizations or at healthcare data & analytic vendors and or as a Data Scientist with 10+ years of experience in Machine Learning, Marketing, Managed Care/ Access and/or Sales Analytics in the Pharma-Biotech space.Prior experience of having client management, project management is mandatory.Deep understanding of Marketing Mix methodologies and use cases is mandatory.MBA or Masters-PhD in Pharmacy- Pharma -Biosciences related fields or Masters in Economics, Data Science/Analytics, Engineering, AI/ML related fields, Operations Research and/or Statistics from top institutes is preferred.Some travel will be required for this role - candidate must be willing to commute periodically to client sites in New Jersey and greater Philadelphia areas.Why we love Definitive, and why you will too!Industry leading productsWork hard, and have fun doing itIncredibly fast growth means limitless opportunityFlexible and dynamic cultureWork alongside some of the most talented and dedicated teammatesDefinitive Cares, our community service group, gives all of us a chance to give backCompetitive benefits package including great healthcare benefits and a 401(k) matchWhat our Employees are saying about us on Glassdoor: “Great Work atmosphere, great work life balance, excellent company to work for, amazing top notch product, incredible customer service, lots of tools to help you succeed.”Business Development Manager“Great team. Amazing growth. Employees are treated very well.”Research Analyst“I have waited 36 years to work at a dream job for a dream company and I am so happy to have finally got there.”Profile AnalystIf you don’t fit all of these qualifications, but believe you’re still a great fit, feel free to apply and tell us why in your cover letter.If you are a California, Colorado, New York City or Washington resident and this role is a remote role, you can receive additional information about the compensation and benefits for this role, which we will provide upon request.Definitive Hiring PhilosophyDefinitive Healthcare is an equal opportunity employer that celebrates diversity and is committed to creating an inclusive workplace with equal opportunity for all applicants and teammates. Our goal is to recruit the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool regardless of race, color, religion, age, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other status. If you’re interested in working in a fast growing, exciting working environment – we encourage you to apply!Privacy Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Candidate Privacy Notice which tells you how we use and process your personal informationPlease note: All communications regarding the hiring process at Definitive Healthcare will come directly from one of our corporate recruiters or coordinators with an @definitivehc.com email address. We will never request any money transfer or purchase of equipment with a promise of reimbursement. If you receive any suspicious communications, please reach out to careers@deinfitivehc.com to confirm your status in the application process.
